  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">

    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

This is a new fragrance. <b>Paragon</b> was launched in 2022. Top notes are Lavender, Sage and Bergamot; middle notes are Plum, Palo Santo and Black Pepper; base notes are Sandalwood and Agarwood (Oud). </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; </fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="76580"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.98399898399848; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.1.jpg" style="width: 3.875rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Lavender-1.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Lavender</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.9567189380854; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.52.jpg" style="width: 3.675rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Sage-52.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Sage</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.75.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Bergamot-75.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Bergamot</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.171.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Plum-171.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Plum</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.597.jpg" style="width: 4.7rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Palo-Santo-597.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Palo Santo</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.74136644894489; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.158.jpg" style="width: 2.525rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Pepper-158.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Black Pepper</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.94222822930411; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.33.jpg" style="width: 3.575rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Sandalwood-33.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Sandalwood</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.7475514178297; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.114.jpg" style="width: 2.55rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Agarwood-Oud--114.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Agarwood (Oud)</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level></pyramid-switch></div></div><div class="cell text-center"><button class="button small" data-open="NotesRatingModal">Vote for Ingredients</button></div></div><notes-rating :perfume_id="76580"></notes-rating></div><div class="cell small-12"><vue-encrypt-postscribe slotid='3a9ad080f73f0cc98071925a994885c8829' slotpayload='{"ct":"Mdmtrhp7MnD6\/vKBi0Y2Cr29xaPdsgAYFKCzkIGwqO9lzcu\/szEjx7ZqvAexjzJqoEwAFWf3yJbqTm8vOOokAEQCTfjiogEbVPnnDhPqagSy+kCsJvImqw6m9sDDnmCGgEHNJ+kdR\/9bCp6+CMcCnCrQ0Bt6jT0MNM8\/degJQVKxvSYET804fTpw4pQrIvOiaNrFhkBtYHYO\/JttIrlArl7W6G6n2LATXCsfhcjCS9PGqQua51lfriPjoVvuZQyQS+pJ+pSoCvlUbDso5Grt5RxLSEin1rlmAHB2t474oCAuNRz3xflq5IU8hLqci6Lh","iv":"8d65bef4d5e9dc55f479f44f7df9dffa","s":"8c63ac6c3aa1e813"}'></vue-encrypt-postscribe></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-padding-y"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_3 -->

slotpayload='{"ct":"wo5OJRXCXomFtZnPEGWK3bdxlZwtWL7nVB77fh8sy9qclwhKgAe\/9tNV5oLjrymoduVPkSPIHgUEN46iMV5Ev7rMTt91lapeqWGuDRDWo3j0YB9g4j7rKrGJqSPNe3DZKG9ZwGIZemGtFcOxMae77aQxofzrGKSjPV3T907YIJ1aTjgo+RmVZI+yJbtnwBLas8hHyHrlY40HsQgEReQgGOqPpPWdnSUzmzlGkVcO6vy4tyMVvfulD0bZQMEjU3ZLDo17qi2FXTenCRR+V3cIs2vxVX81j9a7tDxMy+NgT4c=","iv":"1d66dd753576990813fdeaf85f4efbbd","s":"d054feb38339f5ef"}'></vue-encrypt-postscribe></div><div class="idLinkify"><span class="button small" style="color: white">Find more recommendations</span></span></div><div class="cell small-12" style="padding: 2px;"><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x" id="newreview" style="margin-top:30px"><div class="rw-frame"><p class="linkrg"><span title="/board/register.php" class="rtg">Become a member of this online perfume community and you will be able to add your own reviews.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="cell small-12"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><like style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2370835" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2370835" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="C.Francisque27"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1570494"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="C.Francisque27" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2370835ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2370835" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1570494">C.Francisque27</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-04"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733344285" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Looking at the reviews listed, I think it would be fair to say that many find this fragrance quite polarizing. Some people think it smells like heaven, and others find it repellant; I can understand both of these opinions. Firstly, let me say that I'm someone who thinks the bottle a fragrance comes in, should give the person smelling it a small preview of what they're about to experience. The saying goes "don't judge a book by its cover," but when fragrances come in white bottles, they automatically make me think of a fresh and clean scent i.e. spring/summer; Paragon is not this.<br />
<br />
Paragon is hard to definitively put into one category, but I wouldn't call it "fresh and clean." Upon the first spray, you get a strong, fruity smell, which is no doubt the plum note. Plum isn't an overly-popular fruity note (like cherry or strawberry), so it's quite possible that before Paragon, you may have never smelled it before. I find plum has an incredibly sweet, almost candy-like quality; it's very thick, and saturates throughout all the stages of Paragon. I think it's this aspect that may be polarizing to some. If you don't like the heavy sweetness that plum notes have, this won't be for you. It is somewhat reminiscent of Jean Paul Gauthier's Le Male, but nowhere near as adolescent and bubblegum-like.<br />
<br />
However, if you do like that scent, Paragon promises to take you on a beautiful journey through soft, pleasing, meadow-like smells. The plum is enveloped in a floral embrace by the lavender note, which is a pleasing contrast to the overt-sweetness. The woody-notes prove themselves to be an all-star lineup, here. The sandalwood adds a sophistication and maturity to Paragon that is appreciated, however, the oud note is very faint, almost undetectable. So, if you're put off by the very strong, pungent scent that is associated with oud, this doesn't have it. The Palo Santo makes this smell very rich and luxurious; this is Initio after all.<br />
<br />
However, for me the key-player in this fragrance is the black pepper note; it's what makes Paragon unisex. It provides a distinct sharpness and warmth that only black pepper can. It stops Paragon from being this floral-fruity scent, to something more interesting and complex. I will admit that I wasn't a fan of Paragon at first, but something kept calling me back to it, like I was missing something special; I'm glad I listened to my instincts. When you let this fragrance sit on your skin and hit the outside air, you get to feel the heaven-like magic that is captured in this white bottle. It's calming, it's soothing, it's euphoric.<br />
<br />
The drawbacks of Paragon are that the sillage and projection aren't great for the price you're paying, however, it lasts from the start of your day, until you fall asleep at night. It also tends to transfer onto other people, like if you're hugging them. You will definitely get a compliment if people get close enough to you to smell you. Would I call this scent a masterpiece? No. But it doesn't have to be; it simply is what it is.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2370835"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2370835#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2368322" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2368322" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="obreefish"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2272055"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="obreefish" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Michael-Malul-London/Ocean-Noir-70722.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70722.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ocean Noir"title="Ocean Noir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2368322ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2368322" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2272055">obreefish</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-02">12/02/24 11:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>great!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2368322"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2368322#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2366078" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2366078" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="HunterB10X"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1243050"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1243050.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="HunterB10X" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Homme-Sport-Eau-Extreme-14669.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.14669.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Homme Sport Eau Extreme"title="Allure Homme Sport Eau Extreme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2366078ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2366078" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1243050">HunterB10X</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-30">11/30/24 10:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just another really nice smelling Niche Fragrance from Initio. Paragon is creamy and fruity w/ sandalwood. Really nice silage and performance. Leans a tad feminine. But not too much. Paragon is very versatile and can be worn all seasons. 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2366078"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2366078#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2362743" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2362743" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="doodluv"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1386268"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1386268.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="doodluv" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/XJ-1861-Naxos-30529.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30529.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="XJ 1861 Naxos"title="XJ 1861 Naxos"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2362743ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2362743" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1386268">doodluv</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-27">11/27/24 03:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Does anyone else get Brioni EDP vibes from this? <br />
<br />
Completely different notes but I can't shake the comparison whenever I put this on.<br />
<br />
Simple, clean, powdery, plum comes through nicely although not in a super juicy/fruity way.<br />
<br />
It's definitely a nice, completely unisex, easy to wear fragrance but that's about it. Too expensive for what it brings to the table and not worth the price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2362743"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2362743#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2360033" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2360033" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kreu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2176335"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2176335.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kreu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2360033ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2360033" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2176335">Kreu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-24">11/24/24 13:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Got a sample after reading some reviews and thinking I'd like it from the notes. I totally get the lipstick comparisons as the plum comes off on the dry side rather than the juicier, gourmand type of fruity you might expect; which makes it smell similar to lipstick. I also think this fragrance smells like some sort of hair product but in a good way? It smells really bright and green, also very airy and light so the "uplifting" comments check out.<br />
    The scent stuck to my skin for over 8 hours in which I had showered in that time and it was still noticeable. Only thing with the performance is at least for me, it doesn't really project all that well. Yeah the scent sticks to your skin but it just stays on your skin and doesn't leave much of a scent trial. <br />
<br />
Scent: 4.75/5<br />
Performance: 3.5/5<br />
Price: 2/5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2360033"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2360033#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2356874" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="infiniteambrose"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2219245"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2219245.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="infiniteambrose" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lalique/Encre-Noire-1834.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1834.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Encre Noire"title="Encre Noire"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2356874ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2356874" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2219245">infiniteambrose</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-21">11/21/24 15:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not as I expected but light and supple. Not very original though</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2356874"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2356874#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2353105" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2353105" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="heirnul"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2041097"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2041097.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="heirnul" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Oud-Silk-Mood-48456.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48456.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Silk Mood"title="Oud Silk Mood"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2353105ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2353105" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2041097">heirnul</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-18">11/18/24 10:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got a sample in the summer and remember this being fine, but not anything I'd reach for. Now that its colder however, I really like it. <br />
<br />
As others have said its well blended so most of the notes play with eachother as opposed to being very out there. I'd say the exceptions are the plum and sage, with the bergamont briefly included as a note I pick up on in idle wiffs before it disappears in the drydown. On my skin its fairly sweet with some musky creamy woods. I would say the plum smells like just before you bite into it when the skin is up next to your nose, as opposed to fresh and juicy. The spice is warm and adds a bit to keep it from just being a soft therapy smell I think. <br />
<br />
The full bottle is still a bit steep to me, but I might look into some dupes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2353105"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2353105#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2353031" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2353031" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jambu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1474763"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1474763.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jambu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2353031ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2353031" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1474763">jambu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-18">11/18/24 09:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fruity, creamy, woody fragrance. Very unique imo. The star of the show in the opening is obviously the plum, which I personally haven't smelt in other fragrances.<br />
<br />
In the dry down it almost becomes a completely different fragrance, the woodiness is now very prominent. The woods in this are surprisingly very realistic and natural smelling. However because of this, it gives off a "dusty furniture" type scent to my nose.<br />
<br />
Performance is decent, nothing crazy from my decant that I got. <br />
<br />
Scent: 3.75/5<br />
Performance: 2.5/5<br />
Price: 1.5/5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2353031"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2353031#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2349168" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2349168" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="enders"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1848132"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1848132.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="enders" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jovoy-Paris/L-Art-de-la-Guerre-25957.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25957.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Art de la Guerre"title="L'Art de la Guerre"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2349168ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2349168" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1848132">enders</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-14">11/14/24 15:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the only Initio fragrances I find to be unique &amp; original. Sweet plum combined with woods and some aromatics. Slightly spicy, but mostly a soft, fruity, woody experience. Longevity and projection are both really fantastic, plus this is very unisex! There are some great deals from discounters on this fragrance as well, so look around!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2349168"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2349168#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2347416" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; A flowery sweet bomb at first! Not too overpoweing, personally i get that spicy pepper note on my skin with the oud balancing everything on the other hand. <br />
<br />
Definitely a stand out in the Initio line, opted for this more than the Psychedelic Love, satisfying buy and is truly an interesting spiritual fragrance.<br />
<br />
Overall 7/10 :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2337502"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2337502#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2336287" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2244990">Zircon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-02">11/02/24 23:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I definitely get the sort of cherry Chapstick association some others have mentioned. Still, a very pleasant fragrance. This is the first perfume I've smelled with plum, and it seems to be just right. Not too sweet or tart. I would describe this as fruity, creamy, and mellow.<br />
<br />
I have to give props for this being unique. This is the first I've sampled from Initio because the notes were very intriguing.<br />
<br />
The more I smell it, the more I like it. This is actually a beautiful scent, but I'm not sure if its one that I would wear. I don't know if it suits me much.<br />
<br />
I will be highly enjoying my decant, but the price for a FB makes me cringe.<br />
<br />
Great job to Initio for making something so pleasant and out of the ordinary.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2336287"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2336287#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2329213" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2313745" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="big.mos.q"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1772822"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1772822.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="big.mos.q" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Prada-L-Homme-39029.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39029.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prada L'Homme"title="Prada L'Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2313745ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2313745" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1772822">big.mos.q</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-12">10/12/24 18:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I can't quite put my finger on what it is about this, but I am intensely in love with this smell. The lavender and sandalwood go together like a black on black outfit. Do not tell your friends or relatives or anyone that you have conversations with about this nostril masterpiece. I will most definitely be wasting 300 whatever on it in the coming months and I recommend you don't buy it because I wanna be the only one with it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2313745"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2313745#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2312302" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Immediately ordered a full bottle after sampling. Not blind buy safe so sample first.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2312302"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2312302#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2311439" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2311439" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sirkamal"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1912921"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sirkamal" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2311439ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2311439" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2311439"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2311439#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2307652" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2307652" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nekomimikan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2253975"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2253975.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nekomimikan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-Merchant-of-Venice/Gyokuro-73027.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73027.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gyokuro"title="Gyokuro"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2307652ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2307652" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2253975">Nekomimikan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-07">10/07/24 06:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On my skin I first get a burst of pepper which luckily fades very quickly. What I am left with is a mixture of apple (? :D), palo santo and sage. Creamy, spicy, woody, just a touch fruity and sweet. I can see how people relate to this as a zen fragrance. Out of all the white Initio fragrances this is my fav. I am considering trying out the Lattafa dupe for it since it is not a total love, but a strong like. <br />
I find it to be perfectly unisex and suitable for all seasons and occasions.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2307652"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2307652#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2307256" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2307256"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2307256#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2305980" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2305980" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheScentGuyMX"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2214449"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheScentGuyMX" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2305980ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2305980" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2214449">TheScentGuyMX</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-05">10/05/24 13:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Initio Paragon is a standout in the fragrance world for good reason. As a part of the Initio lineup, it carries the brands signature richness, blending vibrant and deep notes in a way that feels luxurious yet wearable. The fragrance opens with an aromatic freshness, grounded by a smooth, woody base, and is laced with subtle spices that keep it intriguing throughout its wear.<br />
<br />
Its versatility is one of its strongest assets. Whether youre heading to a formal event or wearing it casually, Paragon adapts effortlessly, making it an excellent choice for a signature scent. The sillage is well-balancedenough to be noticed without being overwhelming, and the longevity ensures it stays with you all day.<br />
<br />
In my view, Paragon belongs in any fragrance aficionado's top 5. Its uniqueness and sophistication make it truly memorable, and its ability to suit a wide range of occasions sets it apart from many others</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2305980"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2305980#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2304091" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Super unique fragrance and is unlike anything I've ever smelled. Signature worthy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2301242"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2301242#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2300874" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2300874" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TommyLikesScents"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1701662"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="TommyLikesScents" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Althair-84109.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84109.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Althar"title="Althar"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2300874ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2300874" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1701662">TommyLikesScents</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-01">10/01/24 00:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Worn this twice. (2ml Sample)<br />
<br />
First time, I went heavy on the sprays from my sample and people across a table outside were saying how strong and good it smelled.<br />
<br />
Second time, I put a TINY spray on the back of my hand from to refresh my memory at 1pm. It smelled amazing and was strongly projecting 3 hours later. By 11pm it had become a strong skin scent, this was after washing my hands multiple times throughout the day. Remember, this was from ONE TINY spray.<br />
<br />
10/10 banger<br />
Shame about the price</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2300874"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2300874#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2291445" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2291445" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Zairiph"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2163823"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2163823.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Zairiph" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Narcotic-Delight-89368.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89368.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Narcotic Delight"title="Narcotic Delight"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2291445ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2291445" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2163823">Zairiph</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-22">09/22/24 08:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of my Favorite, if I did not own Alexandria II, this would be my Signature. If you want to smell something cheaper that you can find at a store, in the deodorant section, its called juniper + sage, by Method men. You get that sweet plum berry note, with the earthiness of the sage/ Woodiness, if you think of foraging berries from a deep mystical forest, Blessed barraka is for you, but these notes in Paragon is My Peak, has a bit of a clean out the shower masculine pine filled forest during Christmas with a slight ever-reminiscing subtle sweet plum thats sooo invigorating or at least to me, it is quite a shame on some of the prices. I got it for 140 USD, and was super fortunate, something to think of in a process of why they put a rose gold placard on the bottle, I thought it kind of smelt like that as an image. Wonderful</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2291445"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2291445#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2289072" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; However, it's ridiculously potent. Had an empty travel spray bottle with this in my blazer pocket which I had forgotten about. For several days I kept getting these amazing whiffs around the office, and asked my colleagues if they could smell it and I kept trying to find the source. A few days later, I found the travel spray bottle in my pocket. Anyway, one spray under the shirt and you'll be fine the whole day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2286090"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2286090#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2275317" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's perfect</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2275086"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2275086#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2273116" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2273116" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bugsyiii"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/961762"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.961762.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bugsyiii" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jo-Malone-London/Fir-Artemisia-97917.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.97917.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fir & Artemisia"title="Fir & Artemisia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2273116ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2273116" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/961762">bugsyiii</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-05">09/05/24 20:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just received my bottle after having a sample from Dillard's for nearly a week. I am in love with this fragrance and it's projection is insane!! Third purchase of the brand (Atomic Rose &amp; Blessed Baraka), but whose counting!<br />
A fresh balsamic, yet sweetly fragrance with what I conclude to be a musk/oudy feel, camouflaged as Sandalwood. I really like this fragrance! I am reminded of a fragrance I have entitled Rogart - Molton Brown's Navigation Scent collection with its balsamic flavor and sweetly essence.  <br />
Out of the many notes listed (Lavender, Sage, Bergamot, Plum, Palo Santo, Black Pepper, Sandalwood, Agarwood [Oud]), those that stand out to me are the Lavendar, Plum, Black Pepper, Sandalwood and the Agarwood. <br />
This fragrance has great longevity, great sillage, great performance, and great projection as I mentioned previously. There is a sweetly plum-like aroma along with some bergamont peppery elements that come across in the most intriguing way. <br />
Less is more, a few sprays will go a lonnnnnnnng way, so be careful with trigger.<br />
<br />
A nice fragrance overall that I am going to love wearing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2273116"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2273116#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2272865" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
