padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1676273">ZafFragrance</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-04">09/04/24 14:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wont say much . Hands down my personal favorite drag of all time .</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2271640"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2271640#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2266058" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2266058" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Arber Cami"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/102830"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.102830.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Arber Cami" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Pigmentarium/Genesis-74523.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74523.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Genesis"title="Genesis"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2266058ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2266058" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/102830">Arber Cami</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-30">08/30/24 12:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is such a lovely fragrance. Opening is my least favorite part : slightly fruity but the oud is a little funky/medicinal in the opening, this funkiness dissappear after 15mins. Dry down is woody/aromatic from the lavender and sage, delicate woods, and slightly sweet (not overkill syrupy sweet) and fruity from the palo santo and plum. The notes are very well balanced in the dry down, absolute killer. I dont get any pepper whatsoever. Worth sampling. Only drawback : the price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2266058"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2266058#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2260962" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2260962" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ethanrrs"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2181530"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2181530.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="ethanrrs" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2260962ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2260962" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2181530">ethanrrs</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-25">08/25/24 18:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On my skin this wears WAY sweeter than I had smelled on paper. The aromatic notes are still present but I get an almost candy-like sweetness that I wish was toned down a bit. If it were a bit more balanced in my skin, this could very easily become a daily wear dumb reach contender. I'll try it again in a bit to see if the sweetness still is heavy, because I do enjoy it besides that.<br />
<br />
edit: the sweetness is too much for me, and intensifies as it goes to the heart, opposite of what i want. a little similar to play-doh too. I don't hate it but eh</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2260962"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2260962#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2259785" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2259785" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AlexandraRoseD"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1744436"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1744436.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AlexandraRoseD" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Eau-de-Parfum-Intense-Pour-Femme-71377.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71377.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gucci Guilty Eau de Parfum Intense Pour Femme"title="Gucci Guilty Eau de Parfum Intense Pour Femme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2259785ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2259785" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1744436">AlexandraRoseD</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-24">08/24/24 14:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very well blended, but it is defenetly a super masculine scent due to the strong lavander and sage notes. The opening is overwhelmingly strong and aromatic, but it settles down after a while. <br />
<br />
The drydown is a little bit sweet and herbal, similar to a tabacco note. Tried it a few times, but did not detect any plum note, which I detest.<br />
<br />
Luckly I only bought a 5 ml decant, which I passed to my partner. Smells great on him.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2259785"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2259785#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2259052" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2259052" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sunformiles"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2072327"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2072327.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sunformiles" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2259052ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2259052" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2072327">sunformiles</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-23">08/23/24 22:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Call me crazy, but I get no plumb in this. If its there, its definitely not jumping out. I find this scent to be extremely muted, and pretty hard to pick up anything other than the lavender/light citrus in the opening, and then wood in the dry down. Its very mildly sweet (maybe thats the plumb?) and Im not sure if its loaded with ISO-E super and I go nose blind, but its hard to pick out particular notes. I actually burn palo santo and white sage incense pretty regularly, and cant get either of those notes in this. <br />
<br />
That being said, Id still say this smells absolutely amazing. The longevity is ok, but the projection is honestly pretty bad for this price point, and also bad compared to Musk Therapy, which I also own (same Hedonist line). <br />
<br />
I would not pay full retail for this, but its worth owning if you can get it. <br />
<br />
Smell: 9/10<br />
Projection: 4/10<br />
Longevity: 7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2259052"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2259052#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2258746" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2258746" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="frankcoelho"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1712325"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1712325.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="frankcoelho" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Loumari/Porthole-83054.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83054.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Porthole"title="Porthole"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2258746ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2258746" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1712325">frankcoelho</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-23">08/23/24 14:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Signature worthy.<br />
This is a clean fragrance. It opens with that fruity plum, which then lingers for quite some time into the dry down. However, the citrus from the opening are quite instantly gone.<br />
Develops into a more woody and aromatic fragrance and does not change a whole lot after hour 2-3. Not cloying but quite present the entire life of the fragrance, and I have tested it with only two localized sprays on my arm going out and about my day for roughly a longevity of 8h, which would surely go up with more sprays.<br />
Not complex enough to be worth $200+ but for about $160 to $180 I'd take the 90ml. Still can be worn throughout the year for any occasion. It is extremely versatile and I found it more masculine that full on unisex.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2258746"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2258746#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2258138" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
very beautiful fragrance. <br />
heaven if being scent</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2258138"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2258138#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2256696" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2256696" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="asta99"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2194823"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="asta99" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76580.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Paragon"title="Paragon"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2256696ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2256696" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2194823">asta99</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-21">08/21/24 17:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Amazing! If you are hesitant about buying this, pull the trigger. This is a new pickup for me, but I think it might be the signature scent I was looking for. This is super versatile and gives me many compliments. I wore it today with 2 sprays on the neck, and a coworker stopped me saying: "I can't help but ask, but is that you? It smells so good!" Later that same day, I got a compliment from a couple of my friends when we went out. This lasts super long and projects well; I sometimes need to put on moisturizer, but that is just because my skin is naturally dry. Overall, it was a great buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2256696"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2256696#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2256274" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2239640"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2239640#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2236789" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2236789" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FragGawd"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1520331"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1520331.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FragGawd" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Lafayette-Street-51742.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51742.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lafayette Street"title="Lafayette Street"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2236789ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2236789" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1520331">FragGawd</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-02">08/02/24 11:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Paragon is so interesting. All I get is plum, herbs and wood but its complex at the same time as it transforms. Its not linear at all as but the plum does stay in the background for the entire wearing experience. Not a  sweet plum like whats in Plum in Cognac by Secret Woods. This is a photorealistic plum. Think of biting into a plum thats not the sweetest but not bitter either. The dry down is the best part, the more it dries down the more I like it. To me , this is the best one from Initios Hedonist collection. Ill wear it more for the rest of this month and update this if my opinion changes. For now Paragon is a like for me , not a love yet but I understand why people rave about it. 8.4/10 </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2236789"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2236789#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2236171" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2236171" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="H4jdm"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1896272"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1896272.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="H4jdm" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Imagination-67370.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67370.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Imagination"title="Imagination"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2236171ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2236171" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1896272">H4jdm</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-01">08/01/24 18:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lovely Jubbly</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2236171"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2236171#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2230152" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2230152" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ghostwriter574"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2094708"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ghostwriter574" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2230152ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2230152" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2094708">ghostwriter574</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-26">07/26/24 11:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my favorite Initio. The plum note is delicious, and Palo Santo is my favorite woody smell. It's a great blend where neither overpower the other. <br />
<br />
I agree with people that it has a calming element to it. A chill, weekend morning vibe. It's one of those niche scents that is different enough where you don't see this DNA anywhere and feels very unique, but pleasant and mass appealing so you don't need to worry about smelling TOO different and don't need to overthink wearing it. I feel like it is an all season wear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2230152"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2230152#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2228508" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2228508" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sgd11"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/447632"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="sgd11" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Reflection-45-Man-69488.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69488.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Reflection 45 Man"title="Reflection 45 Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2228508ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2228508" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2098029">Miguelanski</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-22">07/22/24 16:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is such a smooth mind altering fragrance. Paragon is one of those fragrance that definitely lifts your spirits up after smelling it. Sweet Juicy Plum combined with the woody tones. The Palo Santo is not too strong and it's there to complement the plum and make the fragrance more complex. I blind bought it and this was definitely a Win for me! Clones aside, you won't fine any other fragrance that smells like this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2226378"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2226378#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2222172" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2184096">therainman2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-18">07/18/24 06:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a sweet, powdery smooth fragrance, very unique in my opinion, but i don`t like it. Try it if you like smooth woods + sweet powder.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2222172"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2222172#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2219651" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2219651" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Max Tatum"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1730376"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Max Tatum" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kristiansand-New-York/Kristiansand-11432.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.11432.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Kristiansand"title="Kristiansand"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2219651ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2219651" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1730376">Max Tatum</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-15">07/15/24 18:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wait till it settles down, the opening is obnoxious, like horror!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2219651"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2219651#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2218024" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2218024" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JasKiew"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1611442"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1611442.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JasKiew" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Afnan/Historic-Olmeda-75670.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75670.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Historic Olmeda"title="Historic Olmeda"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2218024ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2218024" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1611442">JasKiew</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-13">07/13/24 22:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Paragon Initio Parfums Prives<br />
<br />
Opens fruity sweet and lavender prominent. Very loud and projects really well with good silage. Smells quality and classy and of good ingredients. I feel the scent profile is more feminine But this is quite a special scent profile and better than the common sweet gourmandy scents out there. At least you'll hardly find someone wearing similarly.<br />
<br />
I got myself 2 alternative for Paragon to test myself on similar scent profiles. Al Nashama Lattafa and Vintage Radio Lattafa Pride. I'm not sure why Lattafa chose to release 2 similar alternatives under the same brand despite different collection. The similarities on Al Nashama vs Initio Paragon are not far off. I'll say 70-80% similar, except it opens Abit chemical and you'll need to give it a few minutes to settle on the skin. Also Al Nashama comes across more fruity sweeter. As for Vintage Radio it doesn't open as sweet as Al Nashama but it seems the Palo Santa is slightly more obvious here, profile dna still pretty close just seem more citrusy woody and not as sweet as Paragon, more suitable for guys. <br />
<br />
As the scents develops, I find that both alternatives gets quite close to Paragon. Yes there are slight differences due to the +-10-15 minutes differences I put each on but I think the alternatives are good enough for anyone looking for a Paragon alternative but both alternatives will still remain sweeter on the plum note.<br />
<br />
Basically it's a classy powdery sweet spice scent that cater to specific nose and liking. Not for the masses. Good if you really like such a scent profile.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2218024"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2218024#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2211170" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2211170" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FiekeA"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2164982"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="FiekeA" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Rehab-50351.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50351.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rehab"title="Rehab"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2211170ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2211170" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2164982">FiekeA</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-07">07/07/24 13:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I recently discovered the Initio fragrances and was really curious about Paragon. I ordered a decant and had very high hopes, but was a bit disappointed. I did not detect any plum, fruitiness or sweetness whatsoever. On my skin it's mostly a green, clean, herbal scent and although I like it, I mainly associate it with a spa or an expensive interior. I guess it lacks warmth and feels a bit too 'clinical' for me to wear this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2211170"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2211170#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2199368" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2199368" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RYSE"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2099345"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2099345.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RYSE" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Imagination-67370.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67370.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Imagination"title="Imagination"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2199368ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2199368" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2199368"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2199368#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2199133" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2199133" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="2bClare"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1961281"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1961281.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="2bClare" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Violet/Nuee-Bleue-58148.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.58148.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Nue Bleue"title="Nue Bleue"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2199133ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2199133" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1961281">2bClare</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-25">06/25/24 09:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Paragon is some kind of delicious wizardry. Dont be put off by its initial ten minutes, I  think its the lavender that makes it a bit weird, but after that smooths out its really good. I mean really good! Slightly smoky Palo Santo, juicy and tangy plum, bright bergamot, a bit of green aromatics. Underlying that a sweet and spicy base note that is amazing. I dont know though, I thought I could imagine it after reading the notes but I really couldnt. You have to try it. I smell all those things but the whole is so much better than its parts. It just works. Very very smooth, great sillage, 24 hour longevity, unisex, wearable in all seasons though probably best in warm weather. Pretty much a home run.<br />
<br />
Addendum- some may feel this is expensive, but since it literally lasts 2 days on the skin through multiple hand washings and showers, if you make it a signature scent the bottle will go a looooong way. Im not saying this to be funny, its true.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2199133"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2199133#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2197299" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Meh and cost too much for what it is.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2192358"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2192358#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2188227" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2188227" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cocosette"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/45535"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.45535.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cocosette" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/Another-13-10131.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10131.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Another 13"title="Another 13"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2188227ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2188227" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/45535">Cocosette</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-14">06/14/24 12:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Looking for an empty box of this. align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2180857"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2180857#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2174078" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2174078" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="eaudemale"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1191172"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1191172.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="eaudemale" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62251.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mtore"title="Mtore"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2174078ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2174078" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1191172">eaudemale</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-31">05/31/24 20:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I hated this at the beginning because I dislike anything too licoricey, violet, you know the vibe but this thing kept me going for more of the sample I had until I went for a full bottle. <br />
Sweet violet fruity minty lavender with woody depth.. theres a lot going on and at the same time its very well blended. Paragon will garner you compliments because it does smell very good in the air. As it dries down it gets creamier like a body lotion, could be from the sandalwood. Unisex, for today's standards.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2174078"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2174078#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2170790" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Smells like synthetic smoky cough syrup.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2170790"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2170790#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2170454" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2170454" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KJV"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1243324"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="KJV" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2170454ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2170454" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1243324">KJV</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-28">05/28/24 12:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Who ever said it's not for summer  what do you actually wear? This is a summer night's miracle. <br />
<br />
I rarely fall in love with fragrances after the first sniff, even after the first day it's rare. But paragon did it to me. <br />
<br />
Instead of continuing to drool over it, just know it's really lovely as they say. Brilliantly made. <br />
<br />
Downside? Ah.. longevity is not that good. Initial sillage is good I'd say, based on the comments I received, but it simply switches off pretty fast.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2170454"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2170454#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2167950" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2167950" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Shanty36"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1921076"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Shanty36" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/L-Orchestre-Parfum/Ambre-Cello-67694.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67694.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ambre Cello"title="Ambre Cello"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2167950ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2167950" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1921076">Shanty36</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-25">05/25/24 19:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a beautiful, aromatic woody fragrance. The opening is my favourite, when the plum is the juiciest. It does fade a bit as it sits on the skin, but its presence remains as a slight sweetness that enables me to feel comfortable wearing it as a woman. All of Initio fragrances are such high quality and this is no exception. Performance and projection are strong and the scent itself is unique to me, but not so unique I feel out of place wearing it out and about. I really enjoy this scent and highly recommend. It reminds me of a random mix of rehab and musk therapy from the same line. Almost fuzzy creamy in the base like musk therapy, but aromatic like rehab. Gorgeous.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2167950"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2167950#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2167078" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2161647" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ansary"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1796286"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1796286.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ansary" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2161647ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2161647" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1796286">Ansary</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-20">05/20/24 00:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Longevity is a solid 12+ hours and Projection is moderate. It smells like a jammy plum (like a jammy rose feel) and palo santo fragrance. The smoke from the palo santo is just right not annoying or anything at all just a hint to give it the balance and depth it needs. This is perfectly unisex IMO. In easier terms it smells like strawberry jolly rancher mixed with the smell of palo santo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2161647"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2161647#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2161321" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2161321" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="astralmonad870"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1555935.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="astralmonad870" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dries-Van-Noten/Jardin-de-L-Orangerie-72594.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72594.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jardin de L'Orangerie"title="Jardin de L'Orangerie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2161321ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2161321" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); The other notes however are smooth and well-blended.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2161321"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2161321#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2159786" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2159786" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="olsen_noa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2104352"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2104352.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="olsen_noa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Matiere-Premiere/Vanilla-Powder-84933.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84933.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla Powder"title="Vanilla Powder"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2159786ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2159786" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); Smells like a very sweet plum with some woods. The plum note is definitely the main note, This fragrance gets me so many compliments i really recommend it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2157027"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2157027#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2156808" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2156808" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KristijanV"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1694506"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1694506.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KristijanV" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/M-Micallef/GNTONIC-80353.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.80353.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="GNTONIC"title="GNTONIC"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2156808ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2156808" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1694506">KristijanV</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-15">05/15/24 09:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance has a heavenly aura. The smell is beautiful from the opening until the end, and very noticeably transforms throughout, giving all the notes a spotlight at their own turn. The star notes that make this fragrance so unique are the plum, palo santo and bergamot. This fragrance is extremely versatile, has good projection, and even better longevity. It is inoffensive and suitable for any season and time of the day. The fragrance is more popular with men (including myself) but I find it to be perfectly unisex.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2156808"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2156808#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2154321" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2154321" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ajlis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2074474"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2074474.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ajlis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/The-Noir-29-31872.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31872.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Noir 29"title="The Noir 29"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2154321ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2154321" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2074474">Ajlis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-13">05/13/24 04:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There is something disturbing about the opening note of Paragon, something that reminds me of a fruity bubblegum that has been chewed for too long. When the opening scent subsides, an interesting, complex and deep aroma is revealed underneath it. Its a combination of plum, bergamot, incense, sandalwood, herbs and spices. I quite like that mixture, but the nasty opening prevents me of loving this perfume. Paragon is unisex, but leaning towards the masculine direction. It has the same high quality, craftsmanship and personality as other Initio fragrances I've tried, but this one is just not for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2154321"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2154321#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2148384" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
