align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2148384"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2148384#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2146545" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2146545" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BandmanMrBandman"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2081102"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2081102.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BandmanMrBandman" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1825.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tobacco Vanille"title="Tobacco Vanille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2146545ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2146545" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2081102">BandmanMrBandman</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-05">05/05/24 10:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolute love on first spray. Paragon has such a beautiful and herbaceous opening of sage, lavender, and bergamot that is refreshing and therapeutic. The plum is definitely apparent and gives a nice fruity touch, and I believe I smell the palo santo, which is a little woody and citrusy and rests with the sandalwood nicely. Paragon lasts for a crazy amount of time around 10-12 hours with a soft projection; I can go to bed and wake up and still faintly smell it on my arms. I smelled about half of the Initio brand at this point and Paragon is my favorite yet, it just feels so peaceful and serene smelling and will definitely be buying a fb but if you want the same smell, Lattafa Vintage Radio is pretty much the exact same  <br />
if you can mind the bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2146545"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2146545#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2141398" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2141398" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Patricia888"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/92446"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.92446.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Patricia888" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/BORNTOSTANDOUT/Mud-78864.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78864.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mud"title="Mud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2141398ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2141398" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/92446">Patricia888</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-30">04/30/24 13:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me this is palo santo with lavender sweetened ever so slightly by plum. Definitely woody. <br />
A bit weird and strange which I can imagine can lean one way (to really liking to wear this) or the other (where its strange character could irritate). So, choose carefully.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2141398"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2141398#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2140059" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1034490">jigginssean</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-21">04/21/24 08:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What an utterly bizarre fragrance. I neither hate it or like it but I definitely haven't smelt anything like it before! It has a strange mix of candy like sweetness reminiscent of Parma violet sweets but at the same time, an air of freshness. This is definitely something I wouldn't wear but the scent itself is fine, I guess. For those who are after something unique though, give this a try! Not for me though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2131458"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2131458#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2125218" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2120374" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Oz1212"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2091598"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Oz1212" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2120374ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2120374" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2120374"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2120374#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2119671" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2119671" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Clay_N"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1677050"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1677050.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Clay_N" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Habibi-NY/Honeyed-Tobacco-Oud-68806.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68806.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Honeyed Tobacco & Oud"title="Honeyed Tobacco & Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2119671ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2119671" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1677050">Clay_N</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-09">04/09/24 16:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance had been on my want list for a while, and I finally got a chance to wear it. <br />
<br />
Initially it smells lovely. It has a strong plum note, followed by a woody floral base. It almost gives off a plum forward incense smell after dry down. <br />
<br />
After wearing it a full day, it led me feeling less excited. The plum was still there, but it becomes very light and powdery almost. Not a fan after the first hour.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2119671"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2119671#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2116453" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2116453" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Chesf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1903937"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1903937.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Chesf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Goldfield-Banks-Australia/Bohemian-Lime-60923.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60923.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bohemian Lime"title="Bohemian Lime"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2116453ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2116453" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1903937">Chesf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-06">04/06/24 13:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Top notes are 6, 7 outta 10, as its just ok.<br />
Funnily enough I smelled something damp, green, herbal and mossy in the middle, I guess thats palo santal, I thought it was vetiver. <br />
I couldnt smell the wood at all, I wonder if I have bought the wrong stuff.<br />
Anyways so generic tho. <br />
<br />
<br />
5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2116453"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2116453#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2115351" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2115351" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Maya lilac"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705079"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1705079.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Maya lilac" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2115351ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2115351" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705079">Maya lilac</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-05">04/05/24 11:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Do not throw stones at me but Paragon smells bad. At least in the opening its horrible. Pungent, oudy, peppery, aromatic, barbershop like. Its a strong perfume, Ill give it that but this is too masculine for my taste. Instant dislike for me.<br />
<br />
But then it settles into a more pleasant fruity, woody, aromatic scent. Its supposed to have a strong plum note but I dont get plums out of this. Maybe a very vague trace of some vague fruit. And then more black pepper, clary sage and lavender. And woods.<br />
<br />
Easy pass, I wish I would get what everyone is getting from Paragon. Looking at the comments, most people have a very positive experience with Paragon. By the way, I am testing Paragon from an official Initio Prive sample I got with another purchase, so I dont think its something wrong with my sample. <br />
<br />
Performs great which is normally great because its a very expensive scent!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2115351"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2115351#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2108348" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2107451" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sallylmtle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1982681"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1982681.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sallylmtle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Philosophy/Amazing-Grace-4849.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4849.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Amazing Grace"title="Amazing Grace"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2107451ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2107451" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); I love it. Warm, inviting, familiar, sexy, rich. Lasts forever on the skin.  I am new to fragrance and just learning notes but if I could give it a name, I'd call it Lady Boner. :-)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2107451"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2107451#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2106778" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2106778" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Olenchyk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2043694"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2043694.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Olenchyk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sospiro-Perfumes/Prima-Donna-75939.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75939.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prima Donna"title="Prima Donna"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2106778ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2106778" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2043694">Olenchyk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-28">03/28/24 05:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow, this scent is a lot rolled into one. The mind is instantly scrambling for adjectives: it is sweet, and juicy, and fruity, and spicy, and fresh-aromatic, and citrusy, and woody, and then all those in random order again. <br />
The plum is extremely distinctive and present - it's a ripe juicy, sweet and sour and at the same time, and I can't even say if it's more sour or more sweet, as if honeyed. I also catch teh citrusy bergamot at the beginning. Can't feel the lavender specifically, but something aromatic and flowery is there. The plum note reminded me the plum in Byredo Bibliotheque and I sprayed Bibliotheque on another wrist to compare - yes, exactly like that, just in Bibliotheque it is blended with leather that makes it even stronger and distinctly feminine.<br />
This one is unisex par exellence, but not because it's easy going and indistinct, and not because there's nothing that is too soft or sweet and feminine, or too sharp or fresh and masculine. More because it's just so perfectly blended. All the notes dance around all the time, and it doesn't turn from one thing to another in stages. the woody drydown still has some softness and sweetness to it. No idea how palo santo is meant to smell, maybe that's it. <br />
Soooo intriguing!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2106778"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2106778#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2105810" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2105810" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sean25"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1930641"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1930641.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sean25" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Crivelli/Absinthe-Boreale-53873.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53873.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Absinthe Borale"title="Absinthe Borale"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2105810ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2105810" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1930641">Sean25</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-27">03/27/24 08:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>holy what an amazing scent<br />
<br />
Opens up with a fresh, clean lavender and the best sweet plum note ever. I also notice the palo santo. As it dries down, the creamy sandalwood comes out. I do not notice any wood. This is such a warm, comforting scent that is suitable for all seasons. The smell of this brings me joy and i've never had a bad reaction with it. such a masterfully crafted fragrance that is definitely signature worthy.<br />
<br />
This fragrance has insane performance for what it is. I can smell whiffs of this all day, and from other reactions, it's definitely noticeable but not too overpowering. I love this fragrance and when I first smelt it I knew I had to get a full bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2105810"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2105810#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2105211" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; IMO it's just ok. Certainly a unique fragrance or at least for the general population. A plum, barbershop with... playdoh? That's what I get. It's different. <br />
<br />
Scent: 5/10 (but unique)<br />
Projection: 6/10<br />
Longevity: 7/10<br />
Value: 6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2104560"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2104560#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2097181" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1778265">TomasN21</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-19">03/19/24 06:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh my god!! <br />
This is so amazing! <br />
So unique! <br />
If you want to know how heaven smells, try this.<br />
This is really calming, moody and smooth scent.<br />
If you looking for something ultra masculine, this is not it. <br />
Opening for me is little feminen but after a few minutes leans to unisex.<br />
Perfect for romantic situations or for meditation hahaha. 10/10 love this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2097181"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2097181#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2095724" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2095724" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bizzy1995"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1963702"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bizzy1995" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Homme-523.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.523.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Homme"title="Allure Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2095724ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2095724" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1963702">Bizzy1995</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-17">03/17/24 18:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Gorgeous fresh spicy lavender and sage with a hint of bergamot citrus. Very quickly the plum note comes in and dominates (a bit too much in my opinion) Palo Santo as another strong player.<br />
<br />
As it dries down a bit more the sandalwood begins to take part, adding a warm creaminess to this fragrance. I get a synthetic, western play on oud. This Oud is very nutty. Its actually quite enjoyable and pronounced the more it dries. <br />
<br />
Final thoughts: i really enjoy the freshness of the herbs in the opening, as the opening fades I think the plum becomes quite overbearingly strong but as it dries down more, it becomes more docile. The sandalwood and oud notes are great and work togther with the other notes to create a unique warm creamy woody scent that stands out.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2095724"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2095724#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2094286" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; super good</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2094286"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2094286#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2092199" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2092199" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FlowerSeeker"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1777192"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1777192.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FlowerSeeker" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/Magnifique-3746.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3746.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Magnifique"title="Magnifique"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2092199ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2092199" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); Dries to a creamy peppery wood with a touch of floral, and I swear theres a subtle vanilla too. This is a very nice perfume. Giving it to the hubby.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2092199"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2092199#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2090965" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2090965" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Samurai23"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1536719"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1536719.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Samurai23" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2090965ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2090965" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1536719">Samurai23</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-13">03/13/24 01:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Paragon smells lovely. Never thought about a plum perfume, but this is nice. The fragrance is definitely not super masculine or super feminine. The plum has this coldness or indifference to it that makes it more masculine leaning to me. It's not like a fig fragrance that smells softer and warmer and more feminine (I'm thinking of Fico di Amalfi here). <br />
I'm a man and can definitely picture myself wearing this going out to just chill and not giving a fuck.<br />
<br />
Edit: <br />
Do I like it ? Yes.<br />
Would I buy a whole bottle? No.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2090965"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2090965#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2085636" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2085636" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Zachhh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1987162"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1987162.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Zachhh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53641.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud for Greatness"title="Oud for Greatness"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2085636ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2085636" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1987162">Zachhh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-07">03/07/24 18:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is an extremely unique scent that is hard to break down. The first time I smelled it, my eyes rolled into the back of my head because that plum note is heavenly. The opening has that graceful plum note mixed with the fresh spiciness and palo notes. Lasts around 8-10 hours on skin and forever on clothes. This is on the safer side, its hard to hate this fragrance due to the uniqueness and high quality ingredients. Also extremely versatile.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2085636"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2085636#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2084720" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2084720" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Defragscentient"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2026327"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Defragscentient" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2084720ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2084720" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2026327">Defragscentient</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-06">03/06/24 21:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this is perfumery right here, this to me is surprisingly fresh compared to most "citrus scents" really versatile and the wafts just smell sooooooo goooood <br />
<br />
9/10<br />
<br />
edit<br />
<br />
after a couple of days this is heavily aromatic with scents you can't discern, unfortunately im not a big fan but when it turns into a skin scent it is so creamy and woody with the palo santo i just wish there was more of that then the aromatics on my skin. <br />
new score <br />
<br />
8.2/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2084720"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2084720#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2082619" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2082619" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Legions"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1984702"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1984702.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Legions" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2082619ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2082619" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1984702">Legions</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-04">03/04/24 23:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a beautiful scent that truly does has a level of calming aromatherapeutic effects. I've seen reviews that describe this as a bit more masculine Musk Therapy and I can agree with that based off the sheer emotion I can feel when I take a big whiff of this. Paragon exemplifies the masterful blending of quality oils that's the trademark of the Initio house that I've sampled. That's not to say this isn't perfectly unisex though. After sampling most of the Initio house I would say this is the best warm weather Initio, and quite possibly the best of the Hedonist collection. The Palo Santo and sandalwood give it such a serene woodiness that is complimented with a unique fruitiness from the plum, quite a one of a kind scent, my first full bottle purchase of a niche fragrance actually. This is a beautiful work of art from the aromatic opening to the soothing skin scent phase. <br />
Longevity: Easy 9/10. I get a cool 12 hours of this on skin on a good day, and it expectedly lasts an eternity on clothes. <br />
Projection: 8.5/10 This isn't offensive at all, although it is quite potent while not being nuclear. Strong scent bubble slightly bigger than arm's reach that slowly tapers off through the drydown, strong skin scent about 6-7 hours in. <br />
Versatility: 9.5/10 Once again, this is far from an offensive scent, great performance that allows it to work throughout cooler months, but still light and breezy enough to work in warmer months too. Wonderful scent to wear for daytime errands as well as a night on the town.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2082619"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2082619#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2079940" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2079940" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cocosette"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/45535"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.45535.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cocosette" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/Another-13-10131.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10131.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Another 13"title="Another 13"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2079940ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2079940" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/45535">Cocosette</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-02">03/02/24 09:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I had discarded Initio as a house because everything I've tried has an underlying tackiness from using overpowering base aromachemicals, Atomic Rose being the worst offender.<br />
But Paragon is extremely pleasant, plum on a sandalwood/white musk base with great staying power and projection. I would say it feels like a masculine version of Musk Therapy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2079940"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2079940#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2078269" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Any season any occasion. Casual or formal.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2078269"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2078269#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2074904" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2074904" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="natashaandika"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2000000"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="natashaandika" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2074904ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2074904" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2000000">natashaandika</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-26">02/26/24 13:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the kind of fragrance that makes you roll your eyes because its just so good and so calming. It definitely has that aromatherapy element, but in a way that is therapeutic and bold at the same time. This is not a feminine, innocent, or 'pretty' scent--this is striking and mature. It definitely has that niche quality: the juicy plum and palo santo combined with the soothing lavender makes a very calming yet seductive scent. Bought this on the spot without even trying to look at online deals because to me its just that good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2074904"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2074904#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2070158" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1833243">HOLY Berries</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-19">02/19/24 00:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Scent reminded me when you ride in a semi-open window bus, where there you smell is 1990s car freshener in lavender/ lemon, then at the same time, u smell the driver smoking cigarette that suffocate non-smokers, burning wood + plum fruit stand from place you are passing by, It suddenly stopped and smell this burning tire or clutch.<br />

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2066316" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="doni17"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740489"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="doni17" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kenzo/Kenzo-Homme-Eau-de-Parfum-73225.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73225.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Kenzo Homme Eau de Parfum"title="Kenzo Homme Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2066316ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2066316" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740489">doni17</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-18">02/18/24 12:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is some genderneutral activist scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2066316"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2066316#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2061185" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2061185" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ginandrice"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1246357"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1246357.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ginandrice" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Aesop/Hwyl-46895.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46895.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hwyl"title="Hwyl"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2061185ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2061185" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1246357">ginandrice</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-13">02/13/24 12:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This Is Just To Say<br />
<br />
I have used up <br />
the carded sample <br />
that came with <br />
your order<br />
<br />
and which<br />
is most probably<br />
expensive<br />
to purchase<br />
<br />
Forgive me<br />
it smelled lovely<br />
so sweet<br />
and so calm<br />
<br />
~<br />
<br />
Breezy and deceptively simple. The plum has a clear, succulent, bouncy sweetness to it. Meanwhile the palo santo is a smooth, warm murmur. It's freshest in the opening, with a note of tangy herbaceous zest. Gradually it develops into a cozy, mild, vaguely-fruity wood scent; like cashmere and cream in a plum tree grove.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2061185"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2061185#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2057736" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2057736" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MaggieCN1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1447428"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1447428.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MaggieCN1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mizensir/Celebes-Wood-51855.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51855.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Celebes Wood"title="Celebes Wood"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2057736ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2057736" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); I am a big fan of this house. You cant go wrong with any Initio fragrance. The plum and lavender combination really sets it apart from other woody fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2057736"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2057736#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2053352" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2053352" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JaySentz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1995085"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1995085.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JaySentz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Memo-Paris/African-Leather-31383.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31383.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="African Leather"title="African Leather"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2053352ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2053352" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1995085">JaySentz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-05">02/05/24 18:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wasnt quite expecting the plum to be so dominant, very distinctive and unique against the wood notes. It has freshness, but is dense enough it might get sickly in high temps. Rather than light and bright this is a richer plum.<br />
<br />
Its really interesting, but not feeling full bottle worthy for me. Must smell if you like plum scents.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2053352"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2053352#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2051445" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2046229" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="buonobi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/23408"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.23408.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="buonobi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Portrayal-Woman-54459.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54459.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Portrayal Woman"title="Portrayal Woman"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2046229ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2046229" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/23408">buonobi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-29">01/29/24 19:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm in love....<br />
Not cigarette-like or even smoky to my nose.<br />
Very fruity opening, like plum-fruity bubblegum. <br />
Someone may think a bit weird in the opening.<br />
But after 30m - 1hr, it becomes more creamy &amp; woody, and the plum took the backseat.<br />
If you smell real Palo Santo before, this drydown really show that with fruity touch.<br />
Super long-lasting, the dry-down is very lovely.<br />
Sweet and woody and Paolo Santo is definitely here.<br />
Unisex.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2046229"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2046229#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2045540" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; very suffocating &amp; migraine inducing scent. highly offensive scent.<br />

slightly ok part was the opening only first 3 minutes..</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2045540"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2045540#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2042044" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Beautiful bergamot and lavender somewhat similar to Rehab at the start before giving way to the absolute single best plum note Ive ever smelt in a fragrance. Can be worn any time any place any season. Good performance with a nice scent bubble that lasts the day but isnt overwhelming at all. Perfectly down the line unisex.
