padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1657388">hc123</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-11">01/11/24 17:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Picked up a used tester for 50% off basically full. Still has a weird almost anaseptic edge but I'm addicted. Plum and creamy woody warmth. The only drawback is projection and sillage, on me it's a skin scent within 2 hours so I'm not sure I'd pay full price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2028193"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2028193#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2027882" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2027882" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ksj_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1113640"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1113640.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ksj_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ralph-Lauren/Polo-890.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.890.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Polo"title="Polo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2027882ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2027882" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1113640">Ksj_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-11">01/11/24 11:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I get a Musk Therapy/Urba Pura vibe from this one, but taken in a different direction.<br />
<br />
<br />
This will not be offensive and will probably garner positive attention. But I find it too safe and too boring for a bottle investment.<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
It's worth sampling.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2027882"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2027882#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2024854" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2024854" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="anythingbutobvious"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1953941"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1953941.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="anythingbutobvious" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Obvious/Un-Bois-66309.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66309.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Un Bois"title="Un Bois"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2024854ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2024854" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1953941">anythingbutobvious</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-08">01/08/24 17:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Inhale, exhale, inhale again and so on and so forth Initio's Paragon is nothing short of aromatherapy. Marrying sage and palo santo, the fragrance sees two of the most spiritual ingredients brought together in harmonious union. At this point you might be asking: if sage and palo santo are the scent's heart what is the soul?  Well, on initial spray, juicy plum emerges from the ether, shortly followed by a whiff of black pepper that produces the scent's signature never-cloying ozonic sweetness. While the scent mellows into a creamy sandalwood the longer it dries down, said plum-iness is retained and championed well into it's impressive 5 hour wear time, making it the scent's key player. While the silage leaves something to be desired for a perfum de extrait, the subtle complexity of the scent and it's feel good nature have rewired my brain making me incapable of citing any criticism (did I mention it also last forever on your clothes?). A good fragrance isn't just about the destination, it's the journey; and sometimes the journey isn't across the universe, and instead a weekend getaway to a wellness retreat.  So while where the scent arrives doesn't stray far from it's initial dry down, every side is given its moment to take center stage. Paragon, and it's many facets, not only performs it delivers.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2024854"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2024854#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2023813" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2023813" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kid_Buu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1963669"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1963669.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kid_Buu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76580.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Paragon"title="Paragon"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2023813ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2023813" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1963669">Kid_Buu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-07">01/07/24 16:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolutely fantastic. I IMMEDIATELY bought a full bottle the same day my decant arrived. I had to have it.<br />
<br />
Easy 10/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2023813"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2023813#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2020003" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2020003" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jbozz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1445544"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1445544.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jbozz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/MYSLF-Le-Parfum-94983.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.94983.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="MYSLF Le Parfum"title="MYSLF Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2020003ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2020003" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1445544">jbozz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-04">01/04/24 09:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sexy aromatherapy, that's the kind of vibe I'm feeling with Paragon and I am absolutely in love with it! This stuff is so good, it's beautifully blended with high quality ingredients and just puts you in a calm and relaxed mood. Its like a dream scent. Couldn't stop sniffing myself all evening. Absolutely worthy of the praise it gets but still seems like its "under the radar", and that's fine by me. I have 100+ fragrances in my collection and nothing else I have really smells quite like this. Total niche quality, unique but easy to wear and mass appealing at the same time. It's got the best plum note that I have experienced by far. It does feel slightly feminine in the opening but the drydown is right down the middle unisex and absolutely anybody can enjoy wearing this any time of year except possibly high heat. Overall it feels pretty versatile and could easily be a signature scent (itd be absolutely perfect for a massage therapist). I was lucky to grab this at a pretty fair price before it sold out, but I'm already thinking back up bottle it's that good. Performance is extremely solid, over 14 hours and one shower later, and I can still detect hints of it wafting from my skin. Such a soothing and extremely pleasant scent with an alluring quality. It does have a slightly sweet  powderiness about it so Paragon might not be blind buy safe to everyone, try it first if you can. Personally its  one of my best blind buys and I am so happy to have it. Just a wonderful release from Initio.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2020003"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2020003#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2018498" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; A very beautiful blend of earthy, sweet, and woodiness. I love wearing this before bed, it's very calming and automatic - probably the sage and lavender.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2018498"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2018498#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2015282" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2014740" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gimmegourmandz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1599747"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="gimmegourmandz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Trench-32271.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.32271.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Trench"title="Trench"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2014740ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2014740" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1599747">gimmegourmandz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-29">12/29/23 20:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't have much to say except I LOOOOOOVE this fragrance and it's an absolute compliment magnet. Most recently I wore it to a party and as I made my rounds through the room greeting friends, I had people swarming people demanding to know what I was wearing. It works for every season and every occasion. It's sweet and herbal and ethereal and intriguing and badass and just...eyes roll back good. Definitely unisex. I can't recommend it enough! 11/10 for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2014740"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2014740#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2010947" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2010947" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="monsieur.moustache"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1729574"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1729574.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="monsieur.moustache" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2010947ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2010947" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1729574">monsieur.moustache</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-26">12/26/23 07:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>An intriguing, peppery fragrance. Have not encountered one like this before and it stands out in a very nice way.<br />
<br />
My only quibble is the lack of performance on my skin. It ends up being an airy / ephemeral scent, making only occasional appearances throught the day. If this performed a bit better, it truly would be paragon in my opinion.<br />
<br />
That said, it still deserves a spot in the fragrance pantheon.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2010947"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2010947#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2009767" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2009767" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="monamushroom"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1539708"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1539708.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="monamushroom" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Guidance-78656.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78656.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Guidance"title="Guidance"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2009767ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2009767" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1539708">monamushroom</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-24">12/24/23 15:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I actually came by this fragrance accidentally, but wow did I fall for it. This is absolutely one of my favourites in my collection, and especially during the colder months. <br />
<br />
It is spicy and smells a bit like christmas and potpourri. The plum is sweet and juicy but it is not a sweet perfume at all. It is very neutral and well blended, and it is a lot of green if that makes sense. Like walking in a magical forest. It is creamy, woody and fresh and everything I want in a perfume, all at the same time.<br />
<br />
If I have to paint a picture to this fragrance, it is an herbal Finnish Sauna that warms you up from the inside and makes you feel good, refreshed and relaxed. <br />
<br />
The longetivity is extreme, and I still smell this after hours of sleep, almost as strong as when I first applied it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2009767"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2009767#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2006447" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2006447" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rasteria"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/68265"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.68265.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rasteria" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mona-di-Orio/Vetyver-12957.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12957.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vetyver"title="Vetyver"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2006447ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2006447" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/68265">rasteria</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-20">12/20/23 15:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Truly androgynous and mysterious. It develops and changes and surprises. Fruity, sweet, woody, feminine,masculine A real adventure. Sampling in cold weather, wondering how it will perform in summer. My daughter says it smells classy and I agree.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2006447"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2006447#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2002986" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2002986" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SenileBoomer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1771675"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1771675.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SenileBoomer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2002986ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2002986" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1771675">SenileBoomer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-16">12/16/23 13:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening in this one is very interesting, I tested this myself as well as on a friend, and the plum note smells kind of like a somewhat sour but juicy plum, and we both agreed that when the plum is mixed with the bergamot, it produces a scent very similar to kiwi which stood as a great accent-note to the woodiness. <br />
<br />
Sandalwood also helped create a great base for this one. I think it would've been ruined if they went with animalics or musk as a base, so going with sandalwood and oud just helps support the palo santo. <br />
<br />
The plum and bergamot adds a sort of exotic feel to an otherwise woody/aromatic fragrancem as mentioned kind of kiwi-like. Just sad that it's performance is terrible. <br />
Considering this is allegedly an "extrait" de parfum, it lasts about as long as a fart in the wind.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2002986"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2002986#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2001105" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2001105" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="IceMell"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1685536"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="IceMell" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Beach-Hut-Man-46336.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46336.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Beach Hut Man"title="Beach Hut Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2001105ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2001105" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1685536">IceMell</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-14">12/14/23 09:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What an interesting opening for me if I keep my wrist close to my nose.  Not sure if everyone gets hit like this, but the opening hits me like several little waves of scent in the first minute.  The initial hit is a sweet juicy plum, and almost in the next breath the oud jumps forward.  A couple of seconds later the sage joins the party and woods add a slightly menthol effect.  The lavender and citrus blend in with everything else in the next few seconds and by the end of the first minute I'm left with a sweet, spicy, cool woods and fruity plum and palo santo scent that is smoothly blended and balanced.  Once I get there, I don't notice any other drastic changes in the fragrance.  The sweet plum stays, but slowly tones down, and the spice and the beautiful palo santo pull further forward and I go from loving it to loving it more.  All the while the woods are there, including that beautiful oud note that is neither funky nor animalic.  This state of balance is pretty much where it stays until it gradually fades to a skin scent.<br />
<br />
The projection of this one is strong in the first 30 minutes, but I end up with 6 - 8 hours of gently noticeable but polite sillage for the next few hours.  I can wear this in literally any weather, maybe pulling back on the number of sprays above 90 degrees.  Then again, maybe not, for something this expensive, I'm gonna enjoy it.  It is definitely unisex, but it is sweet, spicy and softly woody, so I know men that would say it's too feminine and women that would say it's too masculine.  You do you.  But I absolutely love this scent.<br />
<br />
If it's out of your price range, strongly consider Vintage Radio by Lattafa.  Even the opening mimics all of the changes for me.  The plum is a little sweeter and more prominent in the beginning, and it takes longer on my skin for the woods to pull forward. If I don't side-by-side wear them I can't tell them apart, and I cannot tell them apart in the air past the opening.  Is Paragon better?  Yeah, absolutely. I'm not getting rid of my bottle. Will anyone know the difference?  No, and if I hit the 5 hour mark on Paragon and want to refresh, I hit a couple of sprays with VIntage Radio.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2001105"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2001105#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1999284" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1999284" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sylect"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1539221"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sylect" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mustang/Mustang-For-Men-Eau-de-Toilette-56900.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56900.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mustang For Men Eau de Toilette"title="Mustang For Men Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1999284ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1999284" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1539221">Sylect</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-12">12/12/23 07:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's giving me luxury boss bottled EDP</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1999284"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1999284#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1998757" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1998757" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Suave_Blanco"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1897426"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1897426.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Suave_Blanco" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1998757ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1998757" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1897426">Suave_Blanco</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-11">12/11/23 15:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I literally cannot say enough good things about this scent. Picture yourself sitting in the room of a World-Class luxury spa, wrapped in the comfiest cotton bathrobe. The air is warm with the heat coming from the stones of your upcoming hot stone massage. Peaceful music permeates the air. Aromatherapy oils waft past your nose. Thats this scent.<br />
<br />
The unique plum note mixes with the Palo Santo to create this paradoxically complex, yet simple scent. The sandalwood as it dries down creates this milky but still light scent, unbelievably smooth from beginning to end.<br />
<br />
It is a shouting whisper. Loud enough to be noticed by others, soft enough to not be overpowering. <br />
<br />
For those of you looking for a beautiful and complex fragrance, this is it. For those of you looking for compliments, this is also it. As my friend so eloquently called it that one is a Baja panty for sure.<br />
<br />
10/10 masterpiece. No notes *chefs kiss*</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1998757"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1998757#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1997021" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1997021" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Luigi408"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1774031"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1774031.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Luigi408" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Royal-Water-7510.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.7510.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Royal Water"title="Royal Water"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1997021ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1997021" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1774031">Luigi408</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-09">12/09/23 13:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Out of the four Initio fragrances that I own this one is now my #1. Good balance of woodiness and sweetness (maybe a bit too sweet). Perfectly unisex (maybe slight masculine leaning). You can wear this any season and any time of day (maybe too sweet for really hot days). Dont pay retail though (above $200). You can find these on discounters but they sell out quick. 8.5/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1997021"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1997021#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1996531" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1996531" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="n4ael"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1696526"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1696526.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="n4ael" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Y-Le-Parfum-64718.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64718.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Y Le Parfum"title="Y Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1996531ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1996531" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1992287"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1992287#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1988355" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1988355" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="OHLAWDTOMFAWD"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1528157"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="OHLAWDTOMFAWD" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1988355ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1988355" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1528157">OHLAWDTOMFAWD</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-29">11/29/23 12:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love it. Opens with an incredibly juicy plum note. The lavender and sage aromatics start to come in through the mid to smooth out the tartness in the plum and then a creamy sandalwood rounds everything off. I dont get a ton of the Palo Santo, not much of the rough woodiness or smokiness you generally get from palo santo, this is more soft and round. Straight out of the atomizer it smells like a sweet red wine with a strong plum accord. <br />
<br />
Does bear a faint resemblance to Naxos once the creaminess sets in. <br />
<br />
10/10 for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1988355"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1988355#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1987502" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1987502" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Raul Claudiu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1687900"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1687900.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Raul Claudiu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Herod-16939.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16939.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Herod"title="Herod"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1987502ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1987502" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1687900">Raul Claudiu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-28">11/28/23 13:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The Rehab DNA is absolutely there. Paragon is less spicy. Sandalwood is very apparent in it though,smells like a straight up sweetened piece of it. The plum note is very similar to the one in L Homme Ideal extreme. This mix creates an almost hypnotic smell, I would really enjoy it more if it wasnt that sweet. Longevity on clothes especially is crazy. Well blended and natural smelling.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1987502"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1987502#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1986804" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1986382" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Clairexoxo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1617341"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1617341.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Clairexoxo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1986382ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1986382" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); I get smoky, fresh, citrus, palo santo and a nice sweet plum. Lasts well on clothing but softer sillage</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1986382"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1986382#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1982089" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1982089" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sabsizzle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1700913"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="sabsizzle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1982089ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1982089" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1700913">sabsizzle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-21">11/21/23 14:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Plum! Lots of plum! I get mild hints of Alien in this.... But very mild.  It settles down on the skin as a cool, plummy, slightly spicy scent. I really like it but just like the other Initio fragrance I tried, it is not a "me" scent, it just doesn't suit me well. I tend to go for gourmands with more vanilla, or bright white florals.  This is deep, romantic, a great unisex scent which would work well in cooler weather.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1982089"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1982089#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1981658" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1981658" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="leonardwashington"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1826154"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1826154.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="leonardwashington" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.472.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Silver Mountain Water"title="Silver Mountain Water"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1981658ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1981658" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1826154">leonardwashington</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-21">11/21/23 04:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wore this one night going to a club. I sprayed this on before I left out to my car. The initial smell was peppery, sweet plum. That smelled like it was blended very well. By time I got to my car and it started to dry down. I WAS SUPER IMPRESSED. It had the smell and vibe of just luxury plum, creamy smoothness that was airy. This is my second favorite fragrance Ive ever owned! When I got to the club I smelled and felt like I was a rich rapper Lbvs. This is definitely a fall/winter fragrance. Wear this when its chill to cold outside.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1981658"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1981658#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1978827" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1978827" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nepria"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1457827"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1457827.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nepria" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1978827ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1978827" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1457827">nepria</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-17">11/17/23 09:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is addictive! This one is just on another level. I think I wrote some vague comment earlier about this perfume, but omg time has passed and things have changed. :D  This time I tested this perfume on myself, I wore it a lot for about two weeks, and omg this is just DIVINE!!! <br />
Paragon is totally different from other perfumes, very nicely blended it is just in perfect harmony. <br />
This smells totally different on the skin than on paper! Like night and day. On paper, it seems a bit hash I even though it has some tobacco notes, but on skin, it's smoooooooth a tad sweet, it has a beautiful sillage!!! <br />
I am so happy that I gave Paragon a second chance, it just shot to the top of my favorite perfumes. Totally FBW!<br />
<br />
EDIT: two weeks later and I'm not even kidding, the more I wear it, the more I love it. AMAZING. I think this just made me doubt my loyalty to Rehab as my favorite Initio perfume. The longevity of this is just divine. I feel this scent opens up very beautifully in cold weather, the sillage is getting even stronger in cold temperatures. I love to smell this on my self.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1978827"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1978827#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1977219" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; There isnt a particular note that outshines the others, making it quite interesting. Wears very close to the body, which is fine, I'm not one of those people chasing Sillage.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1955976"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1955976#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1955117" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1955117" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rozalina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1243220"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1243220.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rozalina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1955117ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1955117" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1243220">Rozalina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-18">10/18/23 10:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a unique fragrance that is reminiscent of aromatherapy for the home. I can see this appealing to lovers of dry, woody unisex scents. The plum is ever so subtle, on my skin I would never be able to tell it is present. This is calming. I dont see how anyone could find Paragon offensive. The note of palo santo is authentic and it is a FAR better interpretation than the nausea-inducing Palo Santo perfume from Carner Barcelona.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1955117"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1955117#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1954543" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1954543" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jujas"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1802477"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1802477.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jujas" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1954543ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1954543" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1802477">Jujas</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-17">10/17/23 18:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This has to be my second best blind-buy discovery, right after Ani Nishane! <br />
<br />
Ive tried for so long to find an elevated, refined plum that doesnt scream mid 2000s frosted lipstick and ratty hair extensions. Its been quite the journey. One that happily ends with Paragon and no tramp stamp.<br />
<br />
Perfectly balanced. Perfectly unisex. Completely unique.<br />
<br />
Airy fresh plum dances effortlessly amongst mood boosting sage and lavender. Palo Santo joins the chorus, but in a subdued way; never overpowering or sharp. Creamy woods with hints of smokiness add mystique and charm.<br />
<br />
Very rarely am I immediately in love with a fragrance.<br />
To say this was love at first sniff might be an understatement. More like an instant obsession. <br />
<br />
<br />
I love it. I might just marry it.<br />
<br />
True story.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1954543"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1954543#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1947792" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; A lot of palo santo, which I like. I consider it less of a perfume and more of aromatherapy - it's a calming, cozy, woody scent that you wanna put on before going to a relaxing evening meditation class in a beautiful yoga studio.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; The bottle is horrendous though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1939436"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1939436#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1936492" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1443003">cubed</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-24">09/24/23 18:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wore this fairly often in the spring season. This reminds me of lounging in a warm, cozy home in my favourite oversized sweater. A pleasant, comforting fruity-woody composition. The plum adds a subtle seductive touch, soft, alluring, and oh so scrumptious! <br />
<br />
The scent profile is quite unique. Signature scent worthy, even. It doesn't lean masculine, but doesn't lean feminine either; perfectly unisex.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1936492"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1936492#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1906003" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1783271">DichterundDenker</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-19">08/19/23 05:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't know of any fragrance where the ingredients smell as authentic as Paragon.<br />
<br />
A subtle, slightly sweet plum. How freshly harvested!<br />
<br />
Slightly smoky but sensual Palo Santo. Not over the top and really smells a bit ethereal.<br />
<br />
Healthy fresh sage. Not severe, but very soothing for the nose.<br />
<br />
A touch of oud. Very noble oud!<br />
<br />
For me a fragrance for every season. Paragon is good for the body and soul.<br />
<br />
I love Paragon!<br />
<br />
PS: Paragon is now on my bedside table. I use it to sleep comfortably.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1906003"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1906003#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1902362" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It is more linear but still fruity and sweet. Like laundry that has been washed with a plum-scented detergent. I like it!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1886856"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1886856#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1886525" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1886525" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dani.G.German"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1795060"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1795060.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dani.G.German" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1886525ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1886525" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1795060">Dani.G.German</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-25">07/25/23 05:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Purchased this for my girlfriend but I also wear it here and there.  The opening is by far my favorite - beautiful and somewhat unique combination of sage, citrus, and a little lavender. Possibly my favorite opening of any non-oud fragrance.  <br />
<br />
The dry down isn't bad either. First time I wore it, it was a little too sweet for me but that was from the tester. The full bottle has performed better. <br />
<br />
Solid 4/5.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1886525"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1886525#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1880370" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
