I dont know what was up with my nose before but Im so glad I got another sample of this. Its like the perfect blend of sweet, spicy, and woody. It projects well and lasts throughout the day. The sillage you leave behind with this is so unique. Initio has quickly become my favorite house and I really want a full bottle of this, as I have Musk Therapy and Psychedelic Love already, but Paragon adds something special. I love it.<br />
<br />
7/16/23: Weirdly enough I an anosmic to this perfume. All I could smell was a bit of lavender. I didnt have anyone around me to ask questions about silage or how it smelled on me.<br />
<br />
After reading these reviews, Im so disappointed! I want to smell this! Stupid nose.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1880370"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1880370#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1878138" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1446987">Moonshine_Strawberries</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-27">06/27/23 19:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow. My first impression was that it smells nice but isnt really a good perfume or cologne scent. More like a scented candle smell. But Ive never seen a fragrance change so drastically. Later I kept sniffing myself all over trying to figure out where the smell was coming from, assuming I was noticing remnants of something from a different day. The dry down is gorgeous. Im still smelling it on my layer I had on yesterday and am just a bit awestruck by it. I get very spiritual vibes from this wood. Im thinking it leans masculine enough I should probably pass it on to my husband though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1866108"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1866108#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1863976" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Great calming creamy scent! This can be worn all seasons, but I will go kind of light with the sprays on HOT HOT days.that black pepper note, can be a bit to Spivey for the hot heat<br />
<br />
- performance is great, I got 10hrs+. The projection isnt the best, but the sillage is amazing. <br />
<br />
<br />
UPDATE: I just purchased a bottle </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1863976"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1863976#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1860072" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1860072" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="THE_Scentaholics"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1712177"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="THE_Scentaholics" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chris-Collins/African-Rooibos-66748.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66748.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="African Rooibos"title="African Rooibos"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1860072ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1860072" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1712177">THE_Scentaholics</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-19">06/19/23 15:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fragrance world, hello!<br />
This scent completes the hedonistic line for initio parfums which started with Musk therapy and rehab. The comments and compliments of the first two are positive and bottle-buy enduring. So, I bought a bottle.<br />
<br />
One sniff, and this stuff is warm, fresh, herbaceous with just a hint of spice (black pepper). I own a lot of fragrances. This is in a league of its own. It's sweet, slightly Minty and the palo santo is clean and nostalgic for those of you that are into aromatherapy.<br />
<br />
Decidedly, unisex. Lasts, quite a while making longevity a non issue. Doesn't project crazily creates a small arms length fragrance cloud around you. This whole line from Initio parfums has been expertly done!<br />
<br />
I have a line of base note fragrance serums I've painted this with and WOW! Add a good oil base to your skin before application and you can definitely punch up the sillage. Do I love this scent? Yes. Does my wife love this yes? Is it unisex? Oh yeah!<br />
<br />
Now let's discuss this price point...(cough) $370!<br />
Price of a frag is not a reflection of its quality or likeability so if you're out there chasing cost for quality..stop. if we are honest it doesn't even take $100 to make this scent. (I've made my own and after you buy ingredients in bulk, the unit cost of fragrance is ridiculously low like $10-20 low) <br />
 So as it stands right now, I can get my hands on. 90 ml bottle for $260. Not bad. If you find better let me know!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1860072"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1860072#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1855211" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1855211" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Linda Stormshot"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1701454"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1701454.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Linda Stormshot" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Caban-32267.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.32267.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Caban"title="Caban"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1855211ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1855211" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1701454">Linda Stormshot</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-13">06/13/23 05:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like it, at least I want to, but seriously I cant think of other than toothpaste in the drydown  So annoying because I WANT to love it.. <br />
<br />
Sillage and longevity seem great!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1855211"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1855211#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1850610" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I can say so much things about this NEW KING Called paragon it speaks for itself</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1846959"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1846959#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1845673" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1845673" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RGH01"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1331188"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1331188.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RGH01" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Francesca-Bianchi/The-Dark-Side-40884.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40884.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Dark Side"title="The Dark Side"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1845673ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1845673" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1331188">RGH01</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-31">05/31/23 03:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Paragon is a very unique scent profile, and not all for the best unfortunately. It opens straight away with a sweet and fruity plum, alongside lavender and pepper. I find the sage to be very intense and aside from the plum, the main note in this fragrance. The sage is very dry, chalky and almost powdery in a bad way.<br />
<br />
As it settles on the skin, the palo santo and sandalwood begin to emerge, however they are continued to be overpowered by this chalky sage that just doesnt give up. I dont detect any oud in this perfume unfortunately. <br />
<br />
If the sage wasnt present, I imagine I would really enjoy Paragon - the plum and palo santo combination is lovely but for me the sage ruins it. This was an unsuccessful blind buy for me and I have since moved it on, disappointing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1845673"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1845673#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1834906" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1834906" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RhettB27"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1345688"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1345688.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RhettB27" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/John-Varvatos/Artisan-Pure-46623.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46623.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Artisan Pure"title="Artisan Pure"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1834906ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1834906" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1345688">RhettB27</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-16">05/16/23 20:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is how Gandalf the White smells. And its awesome. Clean uplifting white sage is prominent with a familiar creamy white sandalwood to Musk Therapy, even a reminiscent clean muskiness, but overall more masculine and not as floral/bright. More woodsy with a fruity-spiciness layered in bolstering the main clean and aromatic musky profile. It does prove to be a pretty different fragrance and while I wasnt initially too impressed it sold itself x100 after a few hours. The initial car freshener vibes were a little off-putting but it settled into such a pleasant and comforting/mood-enhancing nature that was a treat to catch whiffs of later during wear. It truly accomplishes being something suitable for nearly any occasion and one you may even feel inclined to wear when just chilling at the house doing nothing. To me its another absolute winner from Initio thats sure to put you in your happy place AND garner affection with its tremendous performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1834906"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1834906#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1831648" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1681438">vinegarsyndrome</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-05">05/05/23 11:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The plum is tart and juicy, the sage and lavender are herbal and licorice-spicy, the palo santo is airy and elevating. Wish I could afford it...<br />
<br />
I'm standing on top of a mountain I've just summited, looking out over a green valley and over to other peaks. The fresh, thin air swirls in my lungs, burning pleasantly against my hot insides.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1825594"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1825594#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1825486" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1825486" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="YLC629"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1371798"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1371798.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="YLC629" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Commodity/Milk-69191.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69191.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Milk"title="Milk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1825486ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1825486" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1371798">YLC629</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-05">05/05/23 08:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm pretty surprised that I actually hate this on my skin. I like most of the notes, esp the pepper and palo santo. But the oud in this does me dirty<br />
I like the smell of oud, on other people. When I sprayed this, I initially get a really nice plum and palo santo scent, very pretty, but then the oud comes in and obliterates all of the other notes. All I get from there is a stinky oud. Not a fan</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1825486"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1825486#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1820414" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1820414" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Goopertino"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1434152"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1434152.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Goopertino" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-2020-58714.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.58714.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme 2020"title="Dior Homme 2020"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1820414ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1820414" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1434152">Goopertino</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-28">04/28/23 22:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I received a free sample direct from initio on release because I have ordered from them direct. I had to have this. <br />
This is so wonderfully unisex. I would say this is for a confident man who can give a strong, certain of himself vibe while having an effeminate heart to him. *This will not give you that attribute if you dont already have it in your nature.* I have received fawning compliments personally.<br />
For a woman, I would say this is a little more universal. Slightly. I believe it leans a little on the masculine, therefore; this is a fragrance that would give a display of confidence and serious sensuality on the right woman, yet somehow inviting and drive a sense of comfort for the person who catches the aura. <br />
Absolute powerhouse on sillage and somewhat closer on projection. Adds to the mystique.<br />
Fcking amazing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1820414"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1820414#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1820168" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; But dont wear it to yoga, its too strong.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1820168"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1820168#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1814739" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1814739" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Liz-frag"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1288374"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1288374.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Liz-frag" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Atelier-des-Ors/Lune-Feline-29716.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.29716.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lune Feline"title="Lune Feline"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1814739ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1814739" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1288374">Liz-frag</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-22">04/22/23 05:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow! This one actually is a special one. <br />
<br />
Opening is a cherry syrup, very medicinal and sweet. (I know no cherry is listed but it comes up). Then a super therapeutic Palo Santo, extra woody and -to me- leaning masculine, comes through. <br />
<br />
This one should be called rehab in my opinion. I own rehab and I think Paragon takes you to this medicinal journey until a state of high calm. Too calmmaybe it hasnt totally worked and you ended up dead.<br />
A great fragrance with evolution, that would be in my opinion, perfect with the right person. Amazing sillage and longevity as always with Initio. <br />
Not a keeper for me, but a great fragrance overall. You should check it out.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1814739"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1814739#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1814432" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This is softer and creamier but yeah, if you own Opera Id pass on this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1814432"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1814432#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1814407" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1814407" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AoiUsagi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1478659"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1478659.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AoiUsagi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1814407ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1814407" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1478659">AoiUsagi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-21">04/21/23 15:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Somehow, this reminds me of high-end shampoo. I say "somehow," because I've definitely never encountered a shampoo that smells like this, but there's something about the fruitiness that leans that way for me. There is also a strong smoky-woody component which by all rights ought to reduce the hair salon vibes, but it somehow doesn't. That said, I do like it, I just don't know if I'd wear it.<br />
<br />
Edit: I actually wear my sample a fair amount! It suits warm weather and androgynous fashion. It makes me think of a cool boyish girl in slightly boho clothes not full hippie, but a bit carefree and outdoorsy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1814407"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1814407#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1806407" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1806407" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="carblazehell"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1240897"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="carblazehell" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Laurent-Mazzone-Parfums/Lavande-Noire-81615.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81615.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lavande Noire"title="Lavande Noire"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1806407ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1806407" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1240897">carblazehell</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-11">04/11/23 16:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think this is a unisex scent. I really like the way these notes play off each other. At first i wasn't sure, but the longer i wear it, the more i want to smell it. It is very mature smelling to me - not like old lady, but like sophisticated. I picture a woman or man in their 40s or 50s, hosting a dinner party or having drinks after work.  This perfume is sexy and business like to my nose. All work...but also some play. I like it.<br />
<br />
I should also add...i typically can't tolerate Palo Santo very much....it just had this pervasive sharpness that i don't like. It is brilliant in this perfume! It complements the plum perfectly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1806407"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1806407#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1804959" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; </div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1906003" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1906003" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DichterundDenker"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1783271"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1783271.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DichterundDenker" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1906003ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1906003" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1783271">DichterundDenker</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-19">08/19/23 05:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't know of any fragrance where the ingredients smell as authentic as Paragon.<br />
<br />
A subtle, slightly sweet plum. How freshly harvested!<br />
<br />
Slightly smoky but sensual Palo Santo. Not over the top and really smells a bit ethereal.<br />
<br />
Healthy fresh sage. Not severe, but very soothing for the nose.<br />
<br />
A touch of oud. Very noble oud!<br />
<br />
For me a fragrance for every season. Paragon is good for the body and soul.<br />
<br />
I love Paragon!<br />
<br />
PS: Paragon is now on my bedside table. I use it to sleep comfortably.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1906003"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1906003#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1954543" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1954543" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jujas"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1802477"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1802477.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jujas" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1954543ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1954543" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1802477">Jujas</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-17">10/17/23 18:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This has to be my second best blind-buy discovery, right after Ani Nishane! <br />
<br />
Ive tried for so long to find an elevated, refined plum that doesnt scream mid 2000s frosted lipstick and ratty hair extensions. Its been quite the journey. One that happily ends with Paragon and no tramp stamp.<br />
<br />
Perfectly balanced. Perfectly unisex. Completely unique.<br />
<br />
Airy fresh plum dances effortlessly amongst mood boosting sage and lavender. Palo Santo joins the chorus, but in a subdued way; never overpowering or sharp. Creamy woods with hints of smokiness add mystique and charm.<br />
<br />
Very rarely am I immediately in love with a fragrance.<br />
To say this was love at first sniff might be an understatement. More like an instant obsession. <br />
<br />
<br />
I love it. I might just marry it.<br />
<br />
True story.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1954543"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1954543#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1699569" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1699569" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nessers"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1005326"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1005326.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nessers" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Lustre-97927.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.97927.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lustre"title="Lustre"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1699569ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1699569" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1005326">Nessers</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-30">11/30/22 20:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Where have you been all my life! This is exactly what I have been looking for. A spiritual experience in a fragrance. First of all I have yet to smell anything like it. So when you spray it for the first time, it is almost a new sensory explosion. If you are already in the mindset of spirituality... Energy cleansing, nature, alternative medicine etc. This fragrance Will bring you back to center. It's incredibly aromatic, slightly sweet, definitely blonde wood and expertly blended. Jesus I need $400.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1699569"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1699569#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1722492" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1722492" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dudebro"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1392247"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1392247.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dudebro" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Sauvage-Elixir-68415.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68415.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sauvage Elixir"title="Sauvage Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1722492ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1722492" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1392247">dudebro</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-01">01/01/23 11:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought Paragon on New Year's Eve to ring in 2023 with good vibes and spiritual protection. how better than with white sage and palo santo?<br />
<br />
the plum's powerful fruity sweetness starts strong, but it provides aromatic freshness to the entire composition, and transitions beautifully to creamy sandalwood and sweet oud. <br />
<br />
however it's the palo santo that won me over. Within minutes the blonde wood comes forward as the plum takes several seats. the 6-8 hour good-vibes-only dry down gives aromatic creaminess, unique woodiness, and a touch of sweetness to round out the scent. Paragon is 100% unisex, sillage is moderate and steady. <br />
<br />
So far I love it, but had it not been NYE and a birthday gift to myself, I would not have spent the dough.<br />
<br />
9.5/10. strong marks for casual uniqueness, positive vibes, and niche performance. deductions: for that price you can obviously get several more affordable, even "better" fragrances that best fit your needs. this frag was a splurge for me.<br />
<br />
regardless, Happy New Year to everyone! Let's smell fine and love each other in 2023 </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1722492"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1722492#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1751580" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1751580" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="frostyicy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/199445"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.199445.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="frostyicy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kerosene/Fields-of-Rubus-16528.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16528.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fields of Rubus"title="Fields of Rubus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1751580ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1751580" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/199445">frostyicy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-04">02/04/23 07:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very rarely do I come across a fragrance that absolutely blows my socks off and smacks me dead in my face but oh Initio you have done this with Paragon! I'm not going to overtalk it because honestly there isn't a lot to say. I detect every single note that's listed in this fragrance, which is extremely rare in a fragrance. It does evoke a calming, relaxed mood that really uplifts the spirit.<br />
<br />
Scent: 10/10 <br />
Versatility: 10/10<br />
Longevity 10/10 (beast mode 16+ hours on my skin)<br />
Projection 9/10 <br />
Sillage: 10/10 <br />
Seasons: All seasons<br />
<br />
 This is a masterfully blended fragrance.  This is my new signature scent!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1751580"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1751580#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="76580" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1825486" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="YLC629"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1371798"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1371798.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="YLC629" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Commodity/Milk-69191.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69191.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Milk"title="Milk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1825486ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1825486" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1371798">YLC629</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-05">05/05/23 08:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm pretty surprised that I actually hate this on my skin. I like most of the notes, esp the pepper and palo santo. But the oud in this does me dirty<br />
I like the smell of oud, on other people. When I sprayed this, I initially get a really nice plum and palo santo scent, very pretty, but then the oud comes in and obliterates all of the other notes. All I get from there is a stinky oud. Not a fan</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1825486"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1825486#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2174078" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2174078" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="eaudemale"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1191172"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1191172.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="eaudemale" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Meteore-62251.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62251.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mtore"title="Mtore"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2174078ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2174078" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1191172">eaudemale</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-31">05/31/24 20:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I hated this at the beginning because I dislike anything too licoricey, violet, you know the vibe but this thing kept me going for more of the sample I had until I went for a full bottle. <br />
Sweet violet fruity minty lavender with woody depth.. theres a lot going on and at the same time its very well blended. Paragon will garner you compliments because it does smell very good in the air. As it dries down it gets creamier like a body lotion, could be from the sandalwood. Unisex, for today's standards.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2174078"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2174078#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1845673" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1845673" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RGH01"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1331188"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1331188.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RGH01" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Francesca-Bianchi/The-Dark-Side-40884.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40884.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Dark Side"title="The Dark Side"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1845673ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1845673" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1331188">RGH01</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-31">05/31/23 03:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Paragon is a very unique scent profile, and not all for the best unfortunately. It opens straight away with a sweet and fruity plum, alongside lavender and pepper. I find the sage to be very intense and aside from the plum, the main note in this fragrance. The sage is very dry, chalky and almost powdery in a bad way.<br />
<br />
As it settles on the skin, the palo santo and sandalwood begin to emerge, however they are continued to be overpowered by this chalky sage that just doesnt give up. I dont detect any oud in this perfume unfortunately. <br />
<br />
If the sage wasnt present, I imagine I would really enjoy Paragon - the plum and palo santo combination is lovely but for me the sage ruins it. This was an unsuccessful blind buy for me and I have since moved it on, disappointing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1845673"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1845673#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2347416" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2347416" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="zjovano24"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2169458"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="zjovano24" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2347416ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2347416" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2169458">zjovano24</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-13">11/13/24 05:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Initio needs to get over themselves with their prices! If this was reasonably priced, sure, Id get a bottle. Am I dying to get it? Hell no!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="2347416"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=2347416#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1986382" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1986382" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Clairexoxo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1617341"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1617341.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Clairexoxo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1986382ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1986382" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1617341">Clairexoxo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-27">11/27/23 06:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I dont like it but I think I just have an issue with Palo Santo and I also dont connect with the scent because it leans masculine to me. I get smoky, fresh, citrus, palo santo and a nice sweet plum. Lasts well on clothing but softer sillage</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76580"comment_id="1986382"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html?ccid=1986382#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="76580" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

    </div>
    <div class="latest-list flex-container">

        </span>
    </div>
            </div>
        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">21.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });
    }
</script>
